title: Shoot 4K Pictures and Video With This Nifty Foldable Camera Drone, Now Only $69.97
content:
Macworld

Some gifts are a guaranteed hit. It’s just a matter of making sure the right person gets that can’t-miss present.

Once you’ve surveyed your holiday shopping list, we’ll surely find someone (or maybe even multiple someones) who would get a huge charge out of piloting a brand-new drone. The ProVision Foldable 4K HD Camera Drone has the flight capabilities and extra features to get a new drone fan truly excited.

While it doesn’t sport all the bells and whistles of elite-level drone models, the ProVision is more than up to the task of satisfying beginner drone pilots. In addition to a responsive control system, this drone comes with some features learners will appreciate, including a one-click takeoff and return function that can get the craft airborne with a click, or bring it back to you with another click.

Meanwhile, this drone’s dual camera array makes for some truly stunning image and video capture opportunities. You can not only shoot and record true high-resolution 4K footage with the front-facing camera with a 90-degree adjustable angle, but you can even watch your footage in real-time back through your connected device.

Not only is the video quality stellar, but you can even control the action with simple hand gestures. Put up your fingers in a victory sign to trigger the drone to take a picture, or use simple palm gestures to record video. It’s perfect for those who love inventive selfies – because now, you can take one from dozens of feet in the air.

Regularly $109.99, you can get the ProVision Foldable 4K HD Camera Drone now at a price perfect for holiday gift-giving. If you get your order in by 11:59 p.m. on Dec. 3, you get this drone for over one-third off at just $69.97.
